text: How does it work for a library built against lbt that needs 32-bit openblas? Each call to the library must be preceded by lbt_forward?

elements.text: How does it work for a library built against lbt that needs 32-bit openblas? Each call to the library must be preceded by lbt_forward?

text: Uhm, probably not before each call, but I guess it needs one lbt_forward at the beginning to let lbt find the 32-bit blas?

elements.text: Uhm, probably not before each call, but I guess it needs one lbt_forward at the beginning to let lbt find the 32-bit blas?

text: Yeah you need to load like OpenBLAS32 or something and then lbt_forward it
